item.description:
Unknown Zone is trying to find more activities for our members in the
Meriden area.

Let's try out the Coffee Beanery.

A.
http://westfield.com/...

westfield.com/meriden/ourstores/details/coffee-beanery-the-9084.html

Coffee Beanery,
The Coffee Beanery is known for their 100% Arabica coffee from all over the world and offers an enticing selection of specialty and gourmet coffees, teas and pastries.

Location & Parking Tips
Level 2
Store 2220
Located in the upper level Sears wing, ample parking is available in the parking deck near Sears.


B.
http://www.coffeebean...

www.coffeebeanery.com/

C.
http://westfield.com/...

westfield.com/meriden/

The Beanery does not have seating inside but there is seating
outside of the Beanery in the mall hallway.

This Beanery is near the Food Court, so we can go to the
Food Court to get something to eat after a cup of coffee.

If there is bad weather, then this Meet Up will be cancelled.

Depending on the weather, I might go to see “The Green Hornet”
In Wallingford after the Meet Up.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes or Maybe.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ at the Coffee Beanery at Westfield Meriden Mall
